title: Calories in White Mushrooms
meta_description: Discover calories in white mushrooms per 100g, including carbs, protein, fat, fiber, and nutrition tweaks for cooked variations.
assumptions: Raw white button mushrooms, fresh, no added seasonings or oils.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by mushroom size, freshness, variety, and preparation method. Check labels or databases for specifics.

quick_answer.text: 100g of raw white mushrooms provides about 22 kcal and 3.1g protein.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaged products.

tweaks.label: Sautéed in 1 tsp olive oil per 100g
Cooked (boiled or steamed, no added fat) per 100g

faqs.q: How many calories in 100g white mushrooms?
faqs.a: About 22 kcal for raw white mushrooms.
Yes, only 3.3g carbs per 100g, with 1g fiber.
Similar to raw at ~20-22 kcal per 100g if no fat added; sautéing increases it.

faqs.q: Are white mushrooms high in sodium?
